about_the_game:
A unique take on the popular "Backrooms" creepypasta lore, with a focus on dynamic experiences, with procedural levels, complex entities, and engaging puzzles to keep the game fresh and replayable over time.

"If you're not careful and you noclip out of reality in the wrong areas, you'll end up in the Backrooms, where it's nothing but the stink of old moist carpet, the madness of mono-yellow, the endless background noise of fluorescent lights at maximum hum-buzz, and approximately six hundred million square miles of randomly segmented empty rooms to be trapped in.

God save you if you hear something wandering around nearby, because it sure as hell has heard you"

Dynamic, Immersive Experience

Enjoy dynamic and unique experiences in both procedural and hand-made levels so no playthrough is the same.

At your Wit's End

The deeply unsettling and inexplicable nature of the Backrooms pushes the player's sanity to its limit.

You must keep your sanity in check while playing, staying clear of dark or disturbed areas, and avoiding entities, otherwise, your senses might start failing you.

Multiplayer

Enter the Backrooms together with your friends (or find a public lobby!) and work your way to escape the many different levels, communicating through proximity voice chat with the other players.

Level Progression

More than one different exit in each level creates a complex and engaging navigation experience between layers and levels, be sure to not get lost.

Entities

Smart entities with different complex but well-defined behaviors let players learn their patterns and be able to avoid and escape from them successfully.

Participate in the game's development!

The game is under active development, expect regular content updates with new levels, entities, and puzzles!

You can participate directly in the game development by providing your feedback through the game's community page and joining the Discord server!

name: Backrooms: Wit's End

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Backrooms: Wit's End is an immersive coop survival horror game, featuring dreadful spaces and dynamic gameplay mechanics. Explore the different levels with your friends, while trying to escape from many puzzling entities.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, French, German
*languages with full audio support
